title: What data will be erased after my phone is updated?
answer:
After your phone is updated, contacts, messages, email accounts, system settings, and installed applications will be erased. Back up important data on your phone before you update your phone. 

[![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dcc_egpmc.png)](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/40dcc_egpmc.png)

Your phone data will not be erased if HOTA update is used.
